lines.text: We're Texas Rangers, and we have authority to enter any town in the state.
Nobody enters Silver Bullet without a warrant from Sheriff Krebs!
Did he give you a warrant to shoot a Mexican in the head?

[after Quinn fires at them]
There's your answer!
I'm Cassidy of the Texas Rangers.
Not according to the laws of Texas.
I don't recognize the laws of Texas. I am the law here.
